page.title: 03Religion
page.content: There are two churches and three non-Conformist chapels : Baptist , Methodist and Zion in Penyfordd. We have chosen to study {St.John the {Baptist Church}in Pentrobin. At St.Johns there are some commemorative symbols.There is a plaque on the Litch gate which reads { "In loving memory of Norman Charles {Annill 1914-1968 , who used to walk {this path each day ."} Also an oak tree was planted opposite to a stone in the church wall to commemorate the coronation of King George V of England , June 22nd 1911.
